description:
OnboardingContract.processProposal(DaoRegistry,bytes32) (adapters/Onboarding.sol#172-242) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- bank.addToBalance{value: amount}(DaoHelper.GUILD,token,amount) (adapters/Onboarding.sol#213-217)
markdown:
[OnboardingContract.processProposal(DaoRegistry,bytes32)](contracts/adapters/Onboarding.sol#L172-L242) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [bank.addToBalance{value: amount}(DaoHelper.GUILD,token,amount)](contracts/adapters/Onboarding.sol#L213-L217)

description:
DaoRegistry._createNewDelegateCheckpoint(address,address) (core/DaoRegistry.sol#737-754) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[member][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == block.number (core/DaoRegistry.sol#743-744)
markdown:
[DaoRegistry._createNewDelegateCheckpoint(address,address)](contracts/core/DaoRegistry.sol#L737-L754) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[member][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == block.number](contracts/core/DaoRegistry.sol#L743-L744)

description:

markdown:
